document.full_text: rafael nadal of spain used his potent forehand and a strong-arm backhand service return to move easily into the fourth round of the french open saturday. he defeated antonio veic of croatia, the world's 227th ranked player,  6-1, 6-3, 6-0.
document.title: nadal advances to the fourth round
lines_and_colors: rafael nadal of spain used his potent forehand and a strong-arm backhand service return to move easily into the fourth round of the french open saturday. he defeated antonio veic of croatia, the world's 227th ranked player,  6-1, 6-3, 6-0.
